tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_apparel (
    apparel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    apparel_name VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  manager_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_records (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
	equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
	equipment_quantity INT,
	equipment_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE apparel (
	apparel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	apparel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	apparel_size VARCHAR(10),
	apparel_color VARCHAR(20),
	apparel_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	transaction_date DATE,
	customer_id INT,
	equipment_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	total_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE apparel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    phone VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE stock (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    last_stocked DATE
);
